title: Elon Musk Becomes First Person Worth $500 Billion in 2025
shortdescription: Tesla + SpaceX + xAI valuation surge pushes Musk past half-trillion milestone.
description: Tesla hits $1.8T market cap, SpaceX valued at $350B after Starship success, and xAI raises at $120B — combined wealth now exceeds GDP of most countries.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Jeff Bezos Sells $10 Billion Amazon Stock in One Week – Biggest Insider Sale Ever
shortdescription: Bezos cashes out ahead of expected capital gains tax hike under new administration.
description: Amazon founder executes pre-planned 10b5-1 sale of 50 million shares — proceeds to fund Blue Origin and real estate empire.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Bernard Arnault Becomes First European Worth $300 Billion
shortdescription: LVMH shares surge 40% on China luxury rebound and Dior x Nike collaboration.
description: French luxury titan overtakes Zuckerberg and Larry Ellison as Louis Vuitton, Dior and Sephora report record sales in Asia.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Apple Vision Pro 2 Launches at $2,499 – Pre-Orders Surpass 5 Million Units in First Week
shortdescription: Tim Cook's spatial computing vision takes off as Apple stock hits $250 per share on record pre-orders.
description: Pre-orders exceed 5M units in first week, Apple shares surge to $250 — Vision Pro 2 becomes fastest-selling Apple product ever.
author: Wade Jenner

title: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang Joins $200 Billion Club After AI Chip Boom
shortdescription: Huang now richer than Google founders combined as NVDA market cap crosses $4 trillion.
description: Blackwell chip delays resolved, data center revenue up 400% — Jensen's wealth grows $2B per week.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Mukesh Ambani Becomes First Asian Worth $200 Billion
shortdescription: Reliance Jio + Retail empire valued at $400B+ as India becomes world's 3rd largest economy.
description: Jio 5G rollout complete, Reliance Retail expands to 100,000 stores — Ambani overtakes Larry Ellison.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Forbes 2025 Billionaires: The 10 Biggest Gainers Who Made $200B+ Combined
shortdescription: AI, crypto, and defense stocks create new mega-winners in turbulent year.
description: Jensen Huang (+$120B), Pavel Durov (+$18B), and Indian tycoons dominate biggest wealth gains list.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Larry Ellison Joins $200 Billion Club as Oracle Cloud Explodes
shortdescription: AI training demand pushes Oracle to #1 cloud provider for enterprises.
description: Oracle signs $50B deals with OpenAI, xAI, and Meta — stock up 90% YTD, Ellison now #4 richest person.
author: Wade Jenner
